title: Executive Order 5371-Order of Precedence of the Assistant Secretaries of War
content: Executive Order No. 5332, April 22, 1930, temporarily changing the order of precedence of the Assistant Secretaries of War is revoked.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5371-Order of Precedence of the Assistant Secretaries of War Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361108
